extension_description.message: Mark where you stopped reading Orkut topics.
extension_description.description: A short description for the extension

topic_tooltip_mark_allRead.message: Mark the whole topic as read

topic_tooltip_mark_noneRead.message: Mark the whole topic as UNread

page_tooltip_allRead.message: All messages on this page were read

page_tooltip_noneRead.message: No message on this page was read

page_tooltip_mark_allRead.message: Mark this topic as read until this page

page_tooltip_mark_noneRead.message: Mark this topic as UNread from this page

topicList_tooltip_special.message: Topic entirely read. Problably some messages were deleted!

options_label_leave_on_topic_allRead.message: Return to the topic list when marking as all-read

options_label_nextPage_on_page_allRead.message: Go to next page when marking current as read

options_label_leave_on_ignore.message: Return to the topics list when marking as ignored

options_text_export_import_instructions.message:
To export the data, copy the text besides, paste to a file and save it.
To import the data, paste in the field besides and hit the "Save" button.
